TopicTitle: Mk2 Space Station kit (crane+refueler+pushback tractor+SSTO+modules+module deliverer)

Articles.Content:
**Mk2 Space Station Kit:**

Ever since the advent of the Mk2 cargo bays to the game, I've been working off and on to construct a full station kit based on it's size, and have finally completed a somewhat sizable number of modules. But simply making modules is something almost everyone's done. I wanted to do something more. So I decided to additionally create a set of Ground Crew Vehicles so that a single SSTO could launch all of the modules for a space station *without having to be recovered after every flight to add a new module*.

**How the System Works: (\*note\* the vehicles in the album are older versions; the other pictures are of the updated versions)**

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/F3FfY)

**Without further Ado, the Modules:**

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/ldAbI)

All sensors/solar cells/antennae are toggle with Action Group 4.

**Subassembly Downloads (the filenames say 1 m instead of Mk2):**

[**Long Habitation Module**](http://www./download/qwjjj1yma40rqa7/1_m_station_core_long.craft)

[**T-Connector**](http://www./download/250x5e6h8sa36t6/1_m_station_T-joint.craft)

[**Plus-Connector**](http://www./download/v3pp136x8v1c4q6/1_m_station_plus_joint.craft)

[**Lf+O Fuel Module**](http://www./download/w17j9fjt6g60dne/1_m_station_LF_O.craft)

[**Lf Fuel Module**](http://www./download/blu274wbeh7gkn5/1_m_station_LF.craft)

[**Girder**](http://www./download/3s24qvtr6cdqrd0/1_m_station_girder.craft)

[**Space Tug**](http://www./download/np5phckjps7858s/1_m_station_tugboat.craft)

[**Short Habitation Module**](http://www./download/wyecjergshq6g5q/1_m_station_core.craft)

**The SSTO (OO-1U "RoboRoc" - for more information, click the link in my sig and scroll to the SSTO section)**

[![iYi6gD0l.png](http://i.imgur.com/iYi6gD0l.png)](http://imgur.com/iYi6gD0)

[**Download**](http://www./download/d26doc2r3t816v9/OO-1U_RoboRoc.craft)

**The Crane:**

(works using fuel transfer)

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/rCWfB)

[**Download**](http://www./download/nvxvxw5rd51xj52/Mk2_station_module_crane.craft)

**The Refueler:**

(has normal and junior docking ports and is built to fit a Mk2 Clamp-O-Tron with a LY-10 Small Landing Gear beneath it (use should be fairly self explanatory, don't try to pull any turns above 15 m/s with a full tank))

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/DRs4z)

[**Download**](http://www./download/13t91mt6sjrf41y/Mk2_refueler.craft)

**The Pushback Tractor:**

(Should work for any craft with an LY-10 Small Landing Gear Protruding from the bottom of the fuselage)

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/K92Sk)

[**Download**](http://www./download/qdvib6tbcshi4gh/pushback_tractor.craft)

**The Module Deliverer:**

(Attach the modules inside the spaceplane hangar and then launch)

[![aPPjIkgl.png](http://i.imgur.com/aPPjIkgl.png)](http://imgur.com/aPPjIkg)

[**Download**](http://www./download/h93wgcx39cyz23z/Mk2_module_deliverer.craft)

The .craft files have the action groups in the descriptions.

If there's anything I've missed in this description, don't hesitate to comment. I sort of just through all of this together without much editing.

-Ojimak

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-12T19:04:33Z" title="06/12/2015 07:04  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 12, 2015</time> by Ojimak**
Wow! Ingenious! I like things that come in packages!

Thanks!

Should I make a demonstration station for inspiration?

-Ojimak

Green light ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) Go ahead ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

- - - Updated - - -

Does the SSTO have its own name?

The SSTO is based off my OO-1 'Roc' design with the main difference being a lack of crew cabin, hence the designation OO-1U 'RoboRoc'.

-Ojimak

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-13T19:34:00Z" title="06/13/2015 07:34  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 13, 2015</time> by Ojimak**

That is a cleverly made crane ! And I like those station modules, well done ! Rep+

I'm thinking the station could do with some sort of sensor arm/science array though, for looks/functionality.

Yeah, I was thinking about making a science module as well as a module with several probes for exploring the surface of whatever planet the station maybe orbiting.

-Ojimak
